children.value: Ring of Keys offers the resources provided below as an educational tool for the musical theatre community at large, with a focus on queer and trans issues for/about queer women, trans, and gender non-conforming artists. This is by no means a complete list of resources - if you have something you'd like to add, please contact us at
. Happy reading, listening, watching, and action taking!
This list was compiled by Key Member
, a Chicago-based Performer, playwright, and dramaturg.

seo.title: Resources
seo.description: A curated list of queer resources for theatremakers.
